title: String chars as stream
summary: Process string characters as a stream pipeline.
explanation: String.chars() returns an IntStream of character values, enabling functional processing. For Unicode support, codePoints() handles supplementary characters correctly.

whyModernWins.title: Chainable
whyModernWins.desc: Use filter, map, collect on character streams.

whyModernWins.title: Declarative
whyModernWins.desc: Describe what to do, not how to loop.

whyModernWins.title: Unicode-ready
whyModernWins.desc: codePoints() correctly handles emoji and supplementary chars.
